website_summaries.verdict: The Astro Sala deepens Puma’s sneaker collection. The sharp style of these lifestyle kicks will match your stride as easily as they match outfits. Perfect for casual work days to nights of fun, these shoes will provide you with the perfect fit and comfort at an affordable price.The shoes run slightly longer than standard measurement. The Astro Sala features low sides and somewhat flat soles so those looking for support will be sadly disappointed. However, the quality and overall value of the shoes more than make up for these.
pros: Most people who viewed the Puma Astro Sala sneakers loved their sharp, clean style
One person said the shoes made his big feet look slim while another mentioned how his shoes keep drawing looks
Many customers stated that the low-top lifestyle shoes were comfortable from the first wear
A good number of testers remarked that the Puma Astro Sala shoes are well-built and made of quality materials
The lifestyle low-top sneakers are extremely versatile, some users commented
They loved how the shoes can transition from work to hanging out
Several buyers commended the perfect fit of the Puma Astro Sala sneakers
A few consumers praised the lightweight feel of the shoes on their feet
A handful of individuals were pleased with the casual shoes’ price
They described it as “worth every penny” and “not costing an arm and a leg.”
A couple of purchasers were delighted with the good color selection of these Puma kicks
cons: Several people reported that the Puma Astro Sala runs slightly larger than standard sizing
A couple of users were unhappy with the thin soles of the low-top shoes
They also stated that the sides sit low
The shoes provide no arch or ankle support, a few complained
One person remarked that the Puma Astro Sala shoes are hard to clean
They mentioned that the suede holds the dirt in making it difficult to get off

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong size, but nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 9.5 in women's so I ordered the US men's 8. What I was sent was a pair of UK men's size 8, which is 9 here, and essentially a women's size 11! There were no more size 8's left when I wanted to exchange, so I decided to keep them, because they are still well made, comfortable, and a good style. I borderline feel like I'm wearing clown shoes, but I'll be making all the other clowns jealous for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Missa Brigo

customer_reviews.title: Eh, as a life-long Puma fan...they're just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Like any other Puma shoe, they feel really "flat" inside. This is the first time I've had this type of sole on a Puma, so only time will tell how they hold up. So far, early indications on the heel point to the fact that they're a cheap shoe, and as such they aren't made to last. No complaints really, just not that impressed with them. They are light and very flexible. The grip is better then other Pumas, mostly because the sole is softer plastic then others. They stay clean better then the full suede Puma's I've had. I guess my biggest gripe is that I've over time liked less and less the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to replace a 15 + year old classic Puma shoe that you can no longer find anymore. He loved those so much he wore them way longer than he should have. The Puma Astro Sala is not His original shoe, but it does the job. He absolutely loves them and said they're even more comfortable than when he bought his original Pumas back in the day. The toe design reminds him of a quilt, but he lives with it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Fits large, so order a half size smaller for perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I had read other reviews of this show being about a half size too large, so I ordered a half size smaller than usual and it fits perfect. There's not much arch support, but didn't expect any either, so it's all good. I intend to wear with shorts, and provides a nice option to loafers/slip-on's with the low profile.
customer_reviews.author: watch-fan

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very good quality item. I use it mostly indoor soccer game and it is very good. It does not skid and you can make sharp stops or turns. Also, you can wear it for regular days. Long time wear makes your feet little bit tired. I am wearing this more than a year but there no tears or damage. It is very good quality
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit for my wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Dear Puma, please keep making these. I've bought three pair for work and I love them! Super lightweight. Very comfortable. They break in very nicely. Nice fit for my wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well-made sneakers
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers arrived earlier than expected which was a surprised. Well-done. As for the sneakers, they were as what were stated in the description. The comfort level was extremely good! The sole was just right with the extra rubber at the front toes portion to cushion the impact while playing street soccer. These sneakers were very light weight and looked great as a pair casual shoes. I like the canvas material and they had the rubber support at all the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Teo

customer_reviews.title: order half size smaller than usual
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a bit for a new pair of Puma (sneakers) I came across these. I liked what the reviews had to say about them being particularly comfortable. And one review said to order a half size smaller, which I did. They fit perfectly amd are very comfortable and took no breaking in at all. Great walking shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. R. lee

customer_reviews.title: Love these, iron gate white=blue.
customer_reviews.text: In case you can't tell from the pictures, these are blue in daylight. At night and indoors they look mostly gray to gray-blue. But I like them a great deal, they fit well and are practically weightless.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: even then they are a little wide in the toe area and not quite as comfortable as similar style Puma shoes I've owned in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to order 1/2 size smaller than I usually wear in this brand, even then they are a little wide in the toe area and not quite as comfortable as similar style Puma shoes I've owned in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D.

customer_reviews.title: Straight up awesomeness..!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came in on time and are exactly what they were shown to be when purchasing. They fit exactly as advertised and are great quality shoes.. I absolutely love them !!!
customer_reviews.author: william gaston

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and good looking shoe. Good for wider feet. However, this shoe really does not have any arch to it and has a super flat sole. Not comfortable to walk in on hard flat surfaces - so, if you're looking to wear for indoor soccer on hard surface or just to wear cruising around - not the shoe for you.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: ... to upgrade my pair of Pumas that had seen better days, so i went on the hunt for ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to upgrade my pair of Pumas that had seen better days, so i went on the hunt for a new pair. Came across these bad boys who had the classic look with a modern twist too it. They fit well and are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: evil dead

customer_reviews.title: Sporty looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this shoe looks. Always been a big fan of Puma. Initially ordered the same size of this model shoe of previous Puma model shoes I've owned in the past only to find out that the sizing was not the same. This model shoes runs bigger and had to order a smaller size. Nice sporty look to these shoes for lounging and looking sporty but will not be using them as running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Nice Style!
customer_reviews.text: Great style and look. Was a half size too big. Had to return for smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Kesha C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light weight. I like and would recommend. I have wide feet and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: True brand
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't some cheap knockoff junk. Actual Puma product. Nice kicks.
customer_reviews.author: fandalph

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and feeling shoe. Feel like they will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nostaw90

customer_reviews.title: hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: sole wore out in 3 months, comfortable, but not durable
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: They are shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I found them a little narrow, but they are good looking and otherwise comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: They look good
customer_reviews.text: They look great and have held up well for about 6 months of sporadic wear. It's a pretty basic shoe structure-wise -- you'll know where the cracks in the sidewalk are -- but they're comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan M.

customer_reviews.title: Puma makes another great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this shoe 20 times over. Fits perfect, is comfortable, and looks great! Shipping was the typical Amazon Prime super human fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Carl C.

customer_reviews.title: The shoes look good and feel fine
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look good and feel fine. However, the soles are a bit thin. I was expecting the soles to be more like Adidas samba sneakers and they were not. I think for casual activities they are probably fine.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great to wear at the gym. The thin soles make them great for dead lifting and squats.
customer_reviews.author: specialED484

customer_reviews.title: Sole wore out in a month
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it April 3rd. Today is May 3rd and the tread is entirely gone under the ball of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Thoma

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Low quality sneaker. Very thin and flimsy, and the tongue constantly gets stuck to one side.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: It’s actually pink and black
customer_reviews.text: Husband found these and loved them, they are advertised as black & white but they are clearly pink. Still deciding if we are going to keep or send back.
customer_reviews.author: sara wolfe

customer_reviews.title: shoes fall apart
customer_reviews.text: these shoes had so much potential and I was very upset with the performance. The inside sole came out within a few weeks and the outer bottom sole is now wearing thin. won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: ... for my husband and he said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband and he said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim O

customer_reviews.title: I like my tight snug fit my shoes
customer_reviews.text: There's a slight bit of space in the front, I like my tight snug fit my shoes. But in all i love the look to buy another pair, different color.
customer_reviews.author: DEW-L

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. I got the grayish color pair. They are very comfortable and affordably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best sneaker ever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best sneaker I ever had wish I found it sooner
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Vieira Jr

customer_reviews.title: Small, thin, and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were pretty unsubstantial, and with a thin sole, so they weren't very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Lichstein

customer_reviews.title: I like them so much
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are so confortable. I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: aleixer gomez

customer_reviews.title: Easily 0. 5 (if not 1
customer_reviews.text: Easily 0.5 (if not 1.0) sizes too large. My 10.5 US fits like a loose 11 US would.
customer_reviews.author: David U.

customer_reviews.title: Retro cool
customer_reviews.text: Had these as a teen 30 years ago, navy suade. Love the look of them for casuals. Comfort is good but not excellent. May try an insole.
customer_reviews.author: markethan

customer_reviews.title: Good solid built sports wear
customer_reviews.text: Good solid built sports wear. Comfortable. One crucial remark. It seams size is a bit larger than standard PUMA soccer/football cleats. I ordered size US size 8.5 UK size 7.5 or EU size 42 (have to exchange to US size 8). But my previous purchase for a pair of PUMA Classico size US size 9 (UK size 8 EU size 42) measures same as this Astro Sala. It is confusing at times how one should choose size from PUMA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Astro Sala Sneaker
product_meta.description: The astro Sala is an indoor football inspired sneaker with a grippy rubber outsole and toe bumper for superior protection. The deco stitched vamp and mesh-synthetic suede material mix provide classic football cues. A great shoe for any football enthusiasts off the pitch
